title: Varus in season 8
body: Varus in season 8 and the current meta seems op? building rageblade, runnans, and ie? is it just me or is he basically free wins in ranked?

replies.body:
-Varus
-Free win
pick one.

Im only saying this because im yet to come across one that DOESNT int feed ALL game.
Hard to play but sure and you main mid so yeah

yeah i am mid lane main but got auto filled to ad so i gave him a try and he felt so easy to carry and naturally i played a few games of him. Feel like i might play a bit more of ad considering i used to main him and ad.
